alert.note: Alert for Menard (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 1:44AM CDT until November 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Menard County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will cause damage to trees and power lines, with sporadic power outages likely. Additionally, travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along East- West oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...showers and thunderstorms will accompany the windy conditions, and may locally enhance winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
